item.description: what we be about citySec was formed in the summer of 2018 to provide an ongoing outlet for the growing cybersecurity demand and presence at City College. citySec is a collective of cybersecurity enthusiasts. üíª citySec is for everyone. üë• citySec is fun… üé° so have fun with it! üéâ contact Please join our slack channel
